meta.description: After receiving three vaccines last year, Hozart, a beloved cat of the Gorden family, now suffers from vaccine-associated sarcoma (VAS), a type of cancer.

title: Why We Should Never View Vaccines as Harmless
cleaned_text: A beloved family cat in Colorado is dying of a type of cancer very likely caused by a vaccine. Hozart, who belongs to the Gorden family of Colorado Springs, has developed vaccine-associated sarcoma (VAS), probably as the result of a feline leukemia vaccination.

opengraph.title: Why We Should Never View Vaccines as Harmless
